translations.name: Bengali Easy-to-Read Version
translations.description: A Bible prepared especially for Bengali speakers who want a translation that accurately expresses the full meaning of the original text in a style that is clear and easy to understand. This translation is ideal for young people, children, those who are learning to read, those with little or no religious background, and those who speak Bengali as a second language.

translations.name: Chinese Easy-to-Read Bible
translations.description: A Bible prepared especially for Chinese Mandarin speakers who want a translation that is easy to understand. The Easy-to-Read Version™ (ERV) uses simple, everyday language to express the full meaning of the original text. It is ideal for children, those who are learning to read, those with little or no religious background, and those who speak Chinese Mandarin as a second language.

translations.name: 易於阅读的圣经
translations.description: A Bible prepared especially for Chinese Mandarin speakers who want a translation that is easy to understand. The Easy-to-Read Version™ (ERV) uses simple, everyday language to express the full meaning of the original text. It is ideal for children, those who are learning to read, those with little or no religious background, and those who speak Chinese Mandarin as a second language.

translations.name: Easy English Bible
translations.description: The Easy English Bible was a translation published in 2015 with a limited vocabulary of 1200 English words. It is the culmination of 20 years' work by Mission Assist and a mostly volunteer translation staff.

translations.name: Easy English Bible
translations.description: The Easy English Bible was a translation published in 2015 with a limited vocabulary of 1200 English words. It is the culmination of 20 years' work by Mission Assist and a mostly volunteer translation staff.

publishedBibles.derived: Textus Receptus, United Bible Society (UBS) Greek text, Nestle-Aland Text

translations.name: Easy-to-Read Version
translations.description: The Holy Bible: Easy-to-Read Version (ERV) is an English translation of the Bible done by the World Bible Translation Center. It was originally published as the English Version for the Deaf (EVD) by Baker Books.

translations.name: English Version for the Deaf
translations.description: The English Version for the Deaf (EVD) is a Bible published in 1987 by BakerBooks and translated by World Bible Translation Center that eventually became known by its more popular name, The Easy to Read Bible. Intended to meet the needs of the deaf, the EVD uses simpler vocabulary and shorter sentences to make it simpler to understand and uses a thought-for-thought (or functional equivalence) method of translation.

translations.name: English Version for the Deaf
translations.description: The English Version for the Deaf (EVD) is a Bible published in 1987 by BakerBooks and translated by World Bible Translation Center that eventually became known by its more popular name, The Easy to Read Bible. Intended to meet the needs of the deaf, the EVD uses simpler vocabulary and shorter sentences to make it simpler to understand and uses a thought-for-thought (or functional equivalence) method of translation.

translations.name: Simplified English Bible
translations.description: The Simple English Bible was translated by the International Bible Translators in 1979 and 1980. It is based on a limited 3000 word vocabulary and everyday sentence structure. The Simple English Bible is also marketed as the Plain English Bible, the International English Bible, and the God Chasers Extreme New Testament.

translations.name: Simplified English Bible
translations.description: The Simple English Bible was translated by the International Bible Translators in 1979 and 1980. It is based on a limited 3000 word vocabulary and everyday sentence structure. The Simple English Bible is also marketed as the Plain English Bible, the International English Bible, and the God Chasers Extreme New Testament.

translations.name: Hindi 2007 Easy-to-Read Version
translations.description: The Hindi Bible: Easy-to-Read Version (ERV) is a Hindi translation of the Bible done by the World Bible Translation Center, published in 1978. It was especially for people who want a Hindi translation that accurately expresses the full meaning of the original text in a style that is clear and easy to understand.

translations.name: हिन्दी बाइबिल
translations.description: The Hindi Bible: Easy-to-Read Version (ERV) is a Hindi translation of the Bible done by the World Bible Translation Center, published in 1978. It was especially for people who want a Hindi translation that accurately expresses the full meaning of the original text in a style that is clear and easy to understand.

translations.name: Croatian Easy-to-Read New Testament
translations.description: A New Testament prepared especially for Croatian speakers who want a translation that is easy to understand. The Easy-to-Read Version™ (ERV) uses simple, everyday language to express the full meaning of the original text. It is ideal for children, those who are learning to read, those with little or no religious background, and those who speak Croatian as a second language.

The Easy-to-Read Version™ (ERV) uses simple, everyday language to express the full meaning of the original text. It is ideal for children, those who are learning to read, those with little or no religious background, and those who speak Croatian as a second language.

translations.name: Easy-to-Read Portuguese New Testament
translations.description: Perjanjian Novo Testamento: Versão Fácil de Ler was published in 1999, and is the World Bible Translation Center’s Portuguese version of the Easy to Read Bible. All of the Easy-to-Read Bibles are translated to be understood by readers with the bare minimum literacy.

World Bible Translation Center
translations.description_short: World Bible Translation Center exists to translate the Scriptures and make them accessible to the common people around the world in their everyday language.
